Immortal Curse.name: Immortal Curse
Immortal Curse.fullText:
Punisher of the Gods Feature Immortal Curse

You place a curse of death upon your enemy—a sign that immortality is at an end.

Encounter  
Free Action      Close burst 10

Target: One nonminion creature you just damaged.

Effect: Once per round, when you score a critical hit against the target of your immortal curse, you gain an extra standard action. You must use the standard action to attack the target of your immortal curse, and you must use the action before the end of your next turn.


Revision (10/14/2009)
Replace the feature’s Effect text with the following: Once per round, when you score a critical hit against the target of your immortal curse, you gain an extra standard action. You must use the standard action to attack the target of your immortal curse, and you must use the action before the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine Annual, Dragon Magazine 372, page(s) 43.
Immortal Curse.flavor: You place a curse of death upon your enemy—a sign that immortality is at an end.

Repel Legions.name: Repel Legions
Repel Legions.fullText:
Punisher of the Gods Utility 26Repel Legions

You force back the legions or your enemy, which allows you to focus your ire on the one you came to slay.

Daily        Necrotic, Radiant, Zone
Standard Action      Close burst 3

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Effect: The burst creates a zone of destruction and repulsion that lasts until the end of your next turn. Each enemy that starts its turn within the zone automatically takes 15 radiant and necrotic damage and is pushed 3 squares away from you. If an enemy starts its turn within the zone and ends its turn adjacent to you, you push that enemy 5 squares as a free action.

Sustain Minor: The zone persists. When you move, the zone moves with you, keeping you at its center.


Published in Dragon Magazine Annual, Dragon Magazine 372, page(s) 43.
Repel Legions.flavor: You force back the legions or your enemy, which allows you to focus your ire on the one you came to slay.
Repel Legions.effect: The burst creates a zone of destruction and repulsion that lasts until the end of your next turn. If an enemy starts its turn within the zone and ends its turn adjacent to you, you push that enemy 5 squares as a free action.
